name: Strike Force (PunyJam 3 entry)
description:
Strike Force is an homage to the after-school cartoons of the 80's, most especially G.I.Joe. In this game you'll lead two elite agents of Strike Force against the forces of HAVOC as they infiltrate a secret research lab in the depths of the Arctic Ocean. Can you get in and get out with the evidence you need to help Strike Force defeat HAVOC's latest evil plans? Tune in to today's thrilling episode of Strike Force!

*********************************

There are a few outright losing scenarios (with fair warnings). There is also a larger meta-puzzle which can lead to two endings, “good” and “bad." In general, it seems to take about 2 hours or so to complete.

Feel free to leave comments here in itch.io, message me directly, or contact me through intfiction.org.
